channel.title: perth on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in perth on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Arrived in Perth
item.description: 01:43 Saturday 07 October 2017 JST 00:43 Saturday 07 October 2017 Perth Super thanks to E for picking me up from the airport and hosting me in his house. I’ve got twin beds in my own room. Very cozy! We ate yogurt, apples, cinammon. I had chia seeds and nuts as well. Hot tea and now a hot shower for me and bed because we are going to leave in 6.

item.title: It's still yesterday
item.description: 23:59 Wednesday 12 October 2016 AWST I’ve arrived safely in my home for the night in Perth. Thanks to G for hosting me! While he’s at work tomorrow, I can go shopping on his bike; everything is great.

item.title: 95 percent sure I'm going to Perth in late October
item.description: 01:02 Wednesday 26 August 2015 JST I changed my life in 1997 by attending a weekend men’s retreat organized by https://mkp.org/ My ability to understand myself and my emotions / motivations grew exponentially from there. I’m by no means an expert, but I’m much better able to listen to others, and express myself…. though not in this post, apparently!! Anyway, I have missed the energy of this organization since moving to Japan, and recently decided to get involved again.
